document.full_text: novak djokovic dethroned clay king rafa nadal on the spaniard's home soil and maintained his perfect season when he beat the world number one 7-5 6-4 to win the madrid masters title sunday.
document.title: djokovic stuns clay king nadal to win madrid masters
lines_and_colors: novak djokovic dethroned clay king rafa nadal on the spaniard's home soil and maintained his perfect season when he beat the world number one 7-5 6-4 to win the madrid masters title sunday.
